ai-tha-ap447:1.2_0: And when they are mounted, I took the feet and down on the foot.
ai-tha-ap447:1.3_0: seeing the supreme root of a tree
ai-tha-ap447:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap447:2.4_0: this (true) fruit is recommended by the Awakening One,
ai-tha-ap447:4.1_0: It was so welcome for me
ai-tha-ap447:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Pilindivaccha.
ai-tha-ap447:7.1_0: The fifth Elder Pilindivaccha was the fifth Independent Elder Mahā Kassapa,
